articles.description: Xbox Game Pass for console, cloud, PC, and "Ultimate." Do we really need more tiers of Xbox Game Pass? I think there are a few compelling reasons as to why this might be a good idea.
articles.content:
Source: Matt Brown | Windows Central
We already have Xbox Game Pass for Console, for PC, and Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. Do we really need more? Here's why I think the answer to that is yes!
